Author: Moderator
Message: Hello Argiser!

Author: Moderator
Message: Thank you for participating in this study.

Author: Moderator
Message: Are you able to read this?

Author: Argiser
Message: No biggie, glad to help.

Author: Argiser
Message: Yeah, sure am.

Author: Moderator
Message: Alright. In the next posts, I'll be going over the rules of the "game" you're about to play.

Author: Moderator
Message: Once I'll be done, I'll ask you if you've understood the rules, and if you haven't I'll explain them in different words.

Author: Moderator
Message: You're about to talk to Andrew. Andrew is a fictive character that has been completely created for the purpose of this study.

Author: Moderator
Message: You'll be talking to him twice.

Author: Moderator
Message: The only difference between the two conversations you'll have with him, is that in one of them Andrew will be played by a real human.

Author: Moderator
Message: In the other, it will be played by an Artificial Intelligence we are developing.

Author: Moderator
Message: We will call the Human and the Artificial Intelligence the Actors.

Author: Moderator
Message: The order in which you'll be talking to each Actor is random.

Author: Moderator
Message: You will not be talking twice with the same Actor.

Author: Moderator
Message: Both the Artificial Intelligence and the Human will try to portray the same Andrew in the most convincing way they can.

Author: Moderator
Message: Your goal is simple. After talking to the two actors, you'll have to guess which one was the Artificial Intelligence and which one was the Human.

Author: Moderator
Message: Whenever you have made your decision, you are able to stop the conversation by saying [STOP]

Author: Moderator
Message: Each conversation will last for 15 minutes maximum if you do not decide to stop it before.

Author: Moderator
Message: Please, keep your posts to text only (No smileys, no links... etc)

Author: Moderator
Message: Do not type more than one post per answer.

Author: Moderator
Message: Do you understand the rules and what you have to do?

Author: Argiser
Message: I only have one question. If I chose to say stop, it will only be for the current actor, correct?

Author: Moderator
Message: Yes that is correct.

Author: Argiser
Message: I understand, then.

Author: Moderator
Message: Good. Andrew will start the conversation. The 15 minutes will start after your answer. Are you ready?

Author: Argiser
Message: Yes.

Author: Andrew
Message: Hello!

Author: Argiser
Message: Hey there! Funny thing both usernames happen to start with an 'A,' huh? W hat's up?

Author: Andrew
Message: Not much! Yeah it happens. What about you?

Author: Argiser
Message: Just planning out the rest of the day to better allocate work and relaxation time within a healthy balance.

Author: Andrew
Message: Good luck then! Sounds like a tedious thing to do.

Author: Argiser
Message: Just part of every day life. Drawing takes time, so I have to make sure I don't miss my deadlines. What about you? What do you do?

Author: Andrew
Message: Oh are you an artist? I'm just enjoying summer break now, I study Biology.

Author: Argiser
Message: Yeah, sure am. What all ended igniting your passion to get into Biology? And due to how many fields any one person can go into through biology, which one interests you more? It's all interesting to me

Author: Andrew
Message: More specifically I study Neurobiology, but I'm only in my 3rd year. I'm mostly interested in the brain and I've always been interested in trying to figure out how life works.

Author: Argiser
Message: That's awesome stuff. So, out of curiosity, any recently released songs that you enjoy listening to? Music fuels my art, and I wanted to take something from this as inspiration for a new piece of art.

Author: Andrew
Message: Any specific kind you're looking for? I mostly listen to video games music actually.

Author: Argiser
Message: That works! Music is music, whatever suits you is what interests me.

Author: Andrew
Message: I'd say "To Zanarkand" but it's not really recent. I really like Final Fantasy music.

Author: Argiser
Message: Funny, the last drawing I did is inspired by that very game. Seems there's more coincidences here than the starting letter of our usernames, hah!

Author: Andrew
Message: It would seem yes! That's an interesting coincidence.

Author: Moderator
Message: Time is up!

Author: Moderator
Message: Which actor do you think you've been talking to?

Author: Argiser
Message: Am I going to be allowed to change my answer after talking to the second acto r?

Author: Moderator
Message: Yes of course.

Author: Argiser
Message: Though it could be either, I say the human actor for now. Tough decision to make!

Author: Moderator
Message: Alright. We'll begin the second conversation. Andrew will start again and then you'll have 15 minutes after your answer. Are you ready?

Author: Argiser
Message: Yes

Author: Andrew
Message: Hello!

Author: Argiser
Message: Hey Andrew, what's up?

Author: Andrew
Message: Not much really! What about you?

Author: Argiser
Message: Pft, 'not much' isn't very descriptive now is it? Haha. I'm trying to figure out how to manage my work and free time today.

Author: Andrew
Message: It really isn't, but I have to admit that I don't really know what else to say! I'm starting to enjoy my summer break though. What are you working on?

Author: Argiser
Message: Art, I happen to be an artist. I work on a commission basis, freelancer mostly.

Author: Andrew
Message: Oh that sounds really cool! What kind of things do you draw?

Author: Argiser
Message: All sorts, though the most recent one is Final Fantasy inspired. I tend to let music ignite ideas in me. What about you, what makes you passionate?

Author: Andrew
Message: I love studying the brain. I'm actually a biology student. I want to figure out all the biological aspects of learning and things like that. I really love Final Fantasy by the way!

Author: Argiser
Message: Hah! That's SUPER neat stuff. Hey, since music drives me, I wanted to ask if there was any one song that had impact in your life that you might want to share forward as inspiration.

Author: Andrew
Message: A song that had impact on my life? I'd say "To Zanarkand" it's the one song that made me want to start learning piano, and also is one of the first ones I managed to play.

Author: Argiser
Message: Wow, any other instruments you play?

Author: Andrew
Message: No, and I don't really play much piano either anymore. Just from time to time.

Author: Argiser
Message: Hey, with the know how comes the ability to freely practice and develop the skill, you know? I sing, there's a handful of peeps that have asked me to be in their songs, but I'm not ready.

Author: Andrew
Message: I sing, but mostly just in the shower, or when I'm alone. It's probably better that way.

Author: Argiser
Message: Pfah, everyone has their natural voice.

Author: Andrew
Message: Some sound better than others though!

Author: Moderator
Message: Time is up!

Author: Argiser
Message: Neat.

Author: Moderator
Message: Which actor do you think you've been talking to in the first conversation?

Author: Argiser
Message: I think the first was the AI, and the second was the human.

Author: Moderator
Message: On a scale from 1 (not sure at all) to 7 (certain), how confident are you of your answer?

Author: Argiser
Message: A solid 6. There's reasons to believe the reverse answer, but those are fewer from what I gather.

Author: Moderator
Message: Alright thank you for your participation! If you've given you e-mail, we'll send you some information about the results of this study in the coming months.

Author: Moderator
Message: If you have any comments you'd like to share, you can do so now. Otherwise you can close this window.

Author: Argiser
Message: Any way I'll ever know if I was right or not?

Author: Moderator
Message: I can tell you right now, but only if you don't have comments.

Author: Moderator
Message: If you do, I can tell you if you were right or not after your comments

Author: Argiser
Message: My only comment was that this was as entertaining as it was interesting. The minor research I've done into AI is fascinating and I'm glad I was able to help!

Author: Moderator
Message: Thank you very much! And you were right!

Author: Argiser
Message: Neat! I'm proud of me. It was a slight edge in a human touch and response time that made me decide. I've taken social classes and have a lot of social experience, so I put all my efforts into using-

Author: Argiser
Message: -that.

Author: Argiser
Message: Thank you for letting me be a part in this.

Author: Moderator
Message: Thank you for helping! You can now close this window.
